summary: As one of the world's best restaurants opens for its final evening, a couple in the midst of a divorce who made their reservation a year ago (before separating) reunite for a once-in-lifetime meal.
cast: Jan Cornet|Claudia Bassols|Vicenta N'Dongo|Andrew Tarbet|Fionnula Flanagan|Stephen Rea|Togo Igawa|Marta Torné|Akihiko Serikawa|Timothy Gibbs|Andrea Ros|Andrés Herrera|Iván Morales|Marc Rodríguez|Santi Millán|Molly Malcolm|Luka Peros|Octavi Pujades|Sara Espígul|Myles Purcell|Jose Mantero|Nancys Rubias|Josep Roca|Joan Roca|The Excitements|Amanda Baqué|Óscar Monclús|Juan Ignacio Pita
title: Menú degustación
